articles.author: RT
articles.title: NASA warns of STADIUM-SIZED asteroid headed towards Earth - RT
articles.description: The US space agency is warning of a salvo of space rocks headed for Earth, ranging in size from a paltry 10 meters in diameter all the way up to a positively petrifying 213.
articles.content: When not keeping a close eye on its Perseverance rover, which touched down on Mars this week, NASA is busy monitoring the sky for potential threats to life on Earth – namely asteroids. And this week … [+1488 chars]

articles.author: Kelly Whitt
articles.title: Swarm of black holes discovered | Space - EarthSky
articles.description: For the first time, astronomers have detected the presence of a throng of black holes crowding near the center of an ancient globular cluster.
articles.content:
In this episode of Space Sparks, ESA/Hubble summarizes their findings.
Sometimes in science when you set out to find something you had predicted, you instead find something quite different. This was… [+4969 chars]

articles.title: Mars rover takes a nap before searching for a helipad to complete first flight on the Red Planet - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The rover’s impeccable landing on Mars was just a snapshot of things to come
articles.content:
"Ingenuity, the Mars Helicopter I carry, is working as expected, a tweet from Perseverance's Twitter account said.
I'm currently charging it, but once I set it down, it'll rely solely on its solar p… [+542 chars]
